headline: Amazon Expects Kuiper to Serve Five Countries by Early 2026
summary: Ricky Freeman, president of government solutions for the Project Kuiper satellite venture, said Amazon expected to have more than 200 satellites in low-Earth orbit by the end of the year.  Amazon aims to build out a fleet of more than 3,200 satellites, which will offer connectivity to individual customers, businesses and governments.

headline: NIQ Continues Investment in Retail Media Sector with New Leadership Appointment in North America
summary: CHICAGO, September 15, 2025--NielsenIQ (NYSE: NIQ) is pleased to announce the appointment of Drew Dabbelt as Vice President of Retail Media for NIQ North America. Dabbelt, a seasoned leader with nearly 15 years of experience in media, advertising technology, and retail, will spearhead the development of innovations for retail media networks, delivering comprehensive solutions for both retailers and brands.

Dabbelt, a seasoned leader with nearly 15 years of experience in media, advertising technology, and retail, will spearhead the development of innovations for retail media networks, delivering comprehensive solutions for both retailers and brands.

headline: PNK Group Acquires 37 Acres of Land in Connecticut
summary: Industrial developer PNK Group has acquired the Baker Hollow site in Windsor, CT. The 37-acre property will be developed into two facilities of 300,000 and 120,000 square feet. Located just two miles from Interstate 91, ensuring excellent connectivity for the project.

headline: Jason Calacanis Says Amazon Will Replace All Factory Workers And Drivers By 2030. The Idea Of A Human Touching Your Package Will Be 'Insane'
summary: Jason Calacanis believes the future of work is about to look radically different—especially in warehouses and delivery trucks. headline: Similarweb’s 3rd Annual Global Ecommerce Report: Growth Shifts to Apps and AI
summary: TEL AVIV, Israel, September 15, 2025--While ecommerce websites are fighting for every increment of traffic, app-based ecommerce is experiencing strong growth, according to The Global State of Ecommerce 2025 report published today by Similarweb (NYSE: SMWB). The report also finds web marketplaces such as Amazon and Temu growing faster than specialized stores. Meanwhile, the trickle of traffic from AI chatbots is proving important because those visitors are primed to buy.

headline: How Amazon’s Evolving Story Is Shaping Analyst Views and Valuation
summary: Amazon.com’s consensus analyst price target saw only a minor adjustment, rising slightly from $263.18 to $263.74 in the latest update. This marginal change reflects ongoing debates among analysts. Bullish expectations for Amazon’s rapid grocery expansion and improving cloud business are tempered by lingering concerns about operational complexity and cloud competition. Stay tuned to discover how you can monitor shifts in the stock’s narrative amidst this dynamic landscape. What Wall Street Has...

headline: 'Look outside of the Mag 7': Fed rate cut investor playbook
summary: The Federal Reserve will make its decision on interest rate cuts next week, on Wednesday, Sept. 17. Markets are largely expecting an easing of monetary policy. Northwestern Mutual Wealth Management chief portfolio manager of equities Matt Stucky joins Opening Bid host Brian Sozzi to discuss how investors should be positioning their portfolios ahead of the Fed meeting. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Opening Bid.
